item.description:
This will be a intimate event and will only be open to 4 photographers for nude and fine art photography. Each photographer will have more than ample shooting time and have considerable leeway to adjust lighting and set.

If you are available and have been itching to work in this type of setting then this shoot is for you.

Kel has worked at a few of our Meetups, including our recent Meetup this past Thursday, and has done a great job. She has great posing range and can work with classic and avant-garde styles. She also has a good wardrobe to compliment this style.
Photos

The event will run approximately 2.5 hours starting at 6:30PM. Per all our Meetups each photographer will have focused time with the models. This means that no other photographer will be permitted to shoot while you are shooting.

NOTE: Your Paypal payment must be received with your RSVP.

If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Rich
richard@thedustynegative.com
617-680-0450
item.name: An Intimate Night with Kel
